text: In case you weren't already convinced, here's some more compelling evidence that the fixation with lip fillers and injectables has gone TOO FAR, here's a crazy new Botched preview. Botched really does bring the drama, you guys. Meet 27 - year - old Jonathan Dylan, who's seeking out the services of stars Dr. Paul Nassif and Dr. Terry Dubrow on a new episode of the show. His lips are a big deal, but not big enough apparently...'' Growing up I was always really obsessed with dolls,'' Dylan explains, and ` ` I really wanted to look like that.
